tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE athlete_profiles (
    athlete_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT,
    training_history JSONB,
    performance_data JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE AthleteProfiles (
    athlete_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    height DECIMAL,
    weight DECIMAL,
    gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE TrainingHistory (
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id UUID,
    date DATE,
    exercise_name VARCHAR(100),
    duration_minutes INT,
    calories_burned INT
);

CREATE TABLE athlete_profiles (
    athlete_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE training_history (
    athlete_id INT,
    training_date DATE,
    exercise VARCHAR(50),
    sets INT,
    reps INT,
    weight_lifted FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (athlete_id) REFERENCES athlete_profiles(athlete_id)
);

CREATE TABLE performance_data (
    athlete_id INT,
    test_date DATE,
    test_name VARCHAR(50),
    result FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (athlete_id, test_date),
    FOREIGN KEY (athlete_id) REFERENCES athlete_profiles(athlete_id)
);

CREATE TABLE athlete_profiles (
    athlete_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    height_cm FLOAT,
    weight_kg FLOAT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    country_code VARCHAR(3)
);

CREATE TABLE training_history (
    training_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id INT,
    training_date DATE,
    training_type VARCHAR(20),
    duration_minutes INT,
    calories_burned INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (athlete_id) REFERENCES athlete_profiles(athlete_id)
);

CREATE TABLE performance_data (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id INT,
    performance_date DATE,
    performance_metric VARCHAR(30),
    value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (athlete_id) REFERENCES athlete_profiles(athlete_id)
);

CREATE TABLE training_plans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id INT,
    plan_name VARCHAR(50),
    target_metric VARCHAR(30),
    target_value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (athlete_id) REFERENCES athlete_profiles(athlete_id)
);

CREATE TABLE athlete_profiles (
  athlete_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  height FLOAT,
  weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE personal_information (
  info_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  athlete_id INT,
  birth_date DATE,
  address VARCHAR(100),
  email VARCHAR(50),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  emergency_contact_name VARCHAR(50),
  emergency_contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE training_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  athlete_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  training_type VARCHAR(50),
  training_duration INT,
  trainer_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE performance_data (
  performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  athlete_id INT,
  test_date DATE,
  test_type VARCHAR(50),
  test_result FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE training_plans (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  athlete_id INT,
  plan_name VARCHAR(50),
  plan_description VARCHAR(200),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);
